View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.mysql;
2   
3   import com.jsql.model.InjectionModel;
4   import com.jsql.model.exception.JSqlException;
5   import com.jsql.view.terminal.SystemOutTerminal;
6   import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterEach;
7   import org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions;
8   import org.junitpioneer.jupiter.RetryingTest;
9   
10  public class MySqlBlindSuiteIT extends ConcreteMySqlSuiteIT {
11  
12      @Override
13      public void setupInjection() throws Exception {
14          InjectionModel model = new InjectionModel();
15          this.injectionModel = model;
16  
17          model.subscribe(new SystemOutTerminal());
18          
19          model.getMediatorUtils().getParameterUtil().initQueryString(
20              "http://localhost:8080/blind?tenant=mysql&name="
21          );
22  
23          model.setIsScanning(true);
24  
25          model
26          .getMediatorUtils()
27          .getPreferencesUtil()
28          .withIsStrategyTimeDisabled(true);
29  
30          model
31          .getMediatorUtils()
32          .getPreferencesUtil()
33          .withIsNotInjectingMetadata(true);
34          
35          model
36          .getMediatorUtils()
37          .getConnectionUtil()
38          .withMethodInjection(model.getMediatorMethod().getQuery())
39          .withTypeRequest("GET");
40          
41          model.beginInjection();
42      }
43      
44      @Override
45      @RetryingTest(3)
46      public void listValues() throws JSqlException {
47          super.listValues();
48      }
49  
50      @AfterEach
51      public void afterEach() {
52          Assertions.assertEquals(
53              this.injectionModel.getMediatorStrategy().getBlind(),
54              this.injectionModel.getMediatorStrategy().getStrategy()
55          );
56      }
57  }
